original_text: assuming that you have heard about him and were taught in him, as the truth is in Jesus,
korean_text: 진리가 예수 안에 있는 것 같이 너희가 참으로 그에게서 듣고 또한 그 안에서 가르침을 받았을진대

sentences.original_text: assuming that you have heard about him
as the truth is in Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 진리가 예수 안에 있는 것 같이
